"Destroy the Fhan-Jee":
"Destroy the Fhan-Jee and rescue your captured ally!
You will fail if your ally is incapacitated."

"ファンジを破壊してさらわれた仲間を救出せよ！
さらわれた仲間が戦闘不能になると失敗。"
"さらわれたプレイヤーを助け出せ！"

"/face2 The Fhan-Jee was obliterated!
Thank you to everyone who took part!"

"/face4 The rescue of $(0) failed.
I'm sorry. Perhaps if my instructions had been
clearer this wouldn't have happened."

"/face2 ファンジ、完全破壊ですっ！
各員の協力に感謝します！"

"/face4 $(0)さんの
救出に失敗しました……すみません
私の指示が的確なら……っ！"
